name: DEICIDER
description:
DEICIDER is a roguelike dungeon-crawler I am making as my graduation project together with my peer.

This is the first prototype we are releasing, hope you have fun. 

More in 10 weeks...

FEATURES

  • Explore and escape the procedurally generated prison
  • Find and equip different equipment
  • Face and defeat the guardian of the surface

CONTROLS

  • [WASD] to move
  • [Left mouse button] to shoot
  • [Right mouse button] use active (if you have one)
  • [E] pickup equipment
  • [Middle mouse button] to lock on/off enemies
It's pronounced "DEE" + "i" + "cider"
